programme.desc: One vacation. Two teens. Thousands of text messages. What sounds like the beginnings of a typical modern romance turns to tragedyand controversyfor a coastal Massachusetts town.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.desc: In Orlando, our local experts tell you where to devour hummingbird cake, quench your thirst with an intoxicating fish bowl, and find the best bathrooms. These City Beautiful experts know which spots are worth your time.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Justin and Ryan are kicking things into high gear! Will they be able to best a NASCAR Hall of Famer in a lawn mower race?

programme.title: Lowrider Legacy
programme.desc: Lowrider Legacy follows celebrated lowrider families, scholars, and activists and documents the history of resistance on wheels that has defined lowrider culture.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Joe Lugosch is a 31-year-old Mainer who is tired of living on the edge and partying too hard. With the help of Kinga, Joe will get a new perspective on the world outside and change his habits for good.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Whether its hot chicken or gas station pad thai, the Magic City offers plenty of ways to make good things disappear.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.desc: With award-winning Chef Marie Yniguez, Amanda forages for wild ingredients along the Rio Grande, makes paletasMexican popsicles from scratch, and enters a high pressure cooking competition.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.desc: Brendan dodges the fangs of venomous snakes, suits up to wrangle bees and sell local honey, and dives headfirst into protecting the future of Florida's coral reefs.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: The team sets out on a Chaos and Kindness road trip, committing to doing good at every stop, with a very special musical guest joining them at the end.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: In Arkansas, Jimmy Luv screams his way through a zipline, the guys meet a woman caring for dozens of stray cats, then visit an animal sanctuary with rescued big catsand a surprise bear. Its chaos, its kindness, its feline-fueled fun.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: Lifestyle blogger Morgan is ready to find her special someone. Three Des Moines bachelors try to capture her heart one date at a time. Will it be by getting creative, using a good offense or will she roll into love on wheels?

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Fight for your right to start the day right with a 90s-themed breakfast. Climb aboard a bicycle built for twelve, and cruise between boozy destinations that feature everything from classy cocktails to intoxicating IV bags.

programme.title: Only In
programme.desc: Where can you find the Midwest's ultimate cheese haven, a group of burrito-slinging cyclists, and unique art that captivates all? The same place that boasts award-winning ice cream creations and a globally trendsetting bacon festival.

programme.title: KCCI Local News
programme.desc: Get the latest news and weather from KCCI.

programme.title: Pulse: Orlando Still Strong
programme.desc: Two journalists describe the lasting impact of the Pulse nightclub shooting.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: In Birmingham, the guys spark joy with a pizza party, dice games, and small surprises for unhoused neighbors. A mother with MS shares her dream of racing with her family by her side, and a man facing amputation receives a life-changing wheelchair.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: It's the day after Thanksgiving 1992 in Drake, Iowa, and few want to cook. Locals head to the popular Drake Diner instead. In front of a packed restaurant, an armed man shoots and kills two diner employees. Is the town as peaceful as some say?

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.desc: From a dance instructor who prioritizes mental health for her students, to a high school baseball coach who exemplified courage, KC athletes show off their formulas for success.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.desc: On two blind dates in Orlando, local couples cozy up over bird watching, spy friendly gators, sample decadent desserts, and get loose on game night.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Love hurts: These are real-life stories of Americans who were swindled by people who claimed to love them.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: This is the formal food frenzy you don't want to miss. Chefs Tyler Johnson and Ben Lefenfeld are getting bougie for this Black Tie Dinner challenge. Whose meal will win best dressed?

programme.title: Bourbon Blaze: The Night That Tested America's Spirit
programme.desc: When a massive fire hits one of the nations largest bourbon distilleries, the families of competing bourbon companies have to decide whether to lend a hand or let it burn. This is the story of bourbon, Americas native spirit.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Finding Adventure

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.desc: Dedicated mom and nurse, Cleo, spends a day filled with surprises. This incredible mother has overcome obstacles no parent should have to face. Cleo and her sons cook up some quality time.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: Join host Rob Mariano, also known as Boston Rob from the Survivor series, as he explores the best of Beantown from classic institutions to new local gems.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.desc: No one knows a city like the locals who live there. This series taps into the insider knowledge of notable figures including musicians, athletes, chefs, artists, influencers, and others who share their best spots to hit up in the city.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: Successful business owner Hunter, dates three eligible bachelors from Des Moines. From T-shirt making to plant crafting to sparks igniting under the stars, who will get a second date?

programme.title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.desc: 84% of women have been harassed while running. Not Today, by Runner's World, examines this through the stories of three runners. Mollie Tibbetts and Wendy Martinez were both brutally murdered, while Kelly Herron fought off her attacker and survived.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy

programme.title: Ethan: The Miracle Dog

programme.title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.desc: A stranger than fiction documentary that chronicles a semi-scripted extreme sporting league that premiered in 2000. Socker Slam took elements of wrestling, rugby and butts up shenanigans and body slammed them into a soccer drama.

programme.title: Only In

programme.title: The Sadist Of San Luis Obispo
programme.desc: A sexual predator on early release from prison turns the quiet town of San Luis Obispo into a hunting ground, preying on young, unsuspecting, college age women. Through persistence and the tiniest of clues, law enforcement finally tracks down the sadistic killer and brings him to justice.

programme.title: The Bladerunner
programme.desc: An Olympic hero shoots his girlfriend at his home in the middle of the night. Has he mistaken her for an intruder or is it all part of a precisely calculated plot to get away with murder?

programme.title: The Gainesville Ripper
programme.desc: An evil ex-con on the run for attempted murder sets up camp in Gainesville, Florida. But, he's not satisfied just hiding out. This seasoned killer's bloodlust cannot be controlled and he won't stop killing until he's paid back society for his eight years behind bars.
